cern.extjfx.chart.plugins

Class AbstractSingleValueIndicator<X,Y>

  • java.lang.Object
    • cern.extjfx.chart.XYChartPlugin<X,Y>
      • cern.extjfx.chart.plugins.AbstractValueIndicator<X,Y>
        • cern.extjfx.chart.plugins.AbstractSingleValueIndicator<X,Y>
  • Type Parameters:
    X - type of X values
    Y - type of Y values
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    XValueIndicator, YValueIndicator

    public abstract class AbstractSingleValueIndicator<X,Y>
extends AbstractValueIndicator<X,Y>
    Plugin indicating a specific X or Y value as a line drawn on the plot area, with an optional text label describing the value.
    Author:
    mhrabia

    • Property Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Type Property and Description
      DoubleProperty labelPosition
      Relative position, between 0.0 (left, bottom) and 1.0 (right, top) of the description label in the plot area.

      • labelPosition

        public final DoubleProperty labelPositionProperty
        Relative position, between 0.0 (left, bottom) and 1.0 (right, top) of the description label in the plot area.

        Default value: 0.5

        See Also:
        getLabelPosition(), setLabelPosition(double)
